name: QCComposition
desc: The QCComposition class represents a Quartz Composer composition that either:

items.name: init!(file: String!)
items.desc: Returns a composition object initialized with a Quartz Composer composition file.

items.name: init!(data: Data!)
items.desc: Returns a composition object initialized with the contents of a Quartz Composer composition file.

items.name: func attributes() -> [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns the attributes of the composition.

items.name: func protocols() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns the list of protocols to which the composition conforms.

items.name: func identifier() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the unique and persistent identifier for the composition from the composition repository.

items.name: func inputKeys() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array listing the keys that identify the input ports of the root patch of the composition.

items.name: func outputKeys() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array listing the keys that identify the output ports of the root patch of the composition.
